answers.answer: Its Peripheral Neuropathy plus musculoskeletal pain. Do you have Diabetes? You are probably better off finding a neurologist for 300 dollars than an ER visit of 1500+ but if you are in that much pain, go to the ER.
Myofascial Pain Syndrome is a possibility. Anxiety is a good bet too.

question: its been happening over the course of some weeks. I have pains throughout my hands and in the joints now random parts of my arms are hurting more. Some lower back and shoulder pain . I have bloodwork  results in a week but the pain seems worse every day and while I'm still breathing I worry every day gets worse and I'm both in pain and not taking action. My insurance covers emergency services, when is it an emergency?
title: numbness pain in extremities
